column4: is someone willing to help me figure out why when i have firestarter firewall on, that NOTHING goes in our out of the box?
cant surf from it, can't access it from my other pc

: i have dapper installed, i installed firestarter, set some rules, and started the firewall. firewall is up, but nothing works .. can't ssh in to the box, can't access it's webserver, nor can i surf from the box out
have you checked connection from the box?
then your firewall is droping all packets, make sure you do not have a drop before an accept in the rule chain

: no clue what that means .. i just installed ubuntu for the first time last week .. would assume that default install of dapper + firestarter would at least make sure that the firestarter rules are honoured
: how can i check what you've just spoken about?
